item.title: Your terminal with Oh My Zsh, Spaceship, Dracula and more functionalities
item.description: Letting your terminal better to work Hello there. Let’s configuration a beauty and productive terminal. This is not a detailed tutorial. I will leave here links and some commands on how I set up my terminal. It’s easy, just follow in order Terminator Step by step 1. Install Zsh You need to install a different shell. But calm. Nothing will change in relation to bash Access this page. This will help you with installation for your Linux distro.
